data.name: Armstrong for Boobs 'em up
data.detailed_description:
Armstrong is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. He has a very handsome body. Do you think he has more chances to make a good career as a gigolo? Do you want to try how good he would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages. By default the male organ is Off, but in the settings room you can turn it on and switch between the different available organs. When you will play with Armstrong you will also get him as Steam Achievement.

Armstrong was born in Cluj-Napoca, Romania, in family of musicians. When he was a child he traveled a lot with his parents, they made concerts in different cities and countries.

When Armstrong was 20, he tried himself as a writer, he even published his first novel, Brutal, and two years later he published a collection of his poems. But very soon he understood that it will not bring him a lot of money.

In 2013 he moved to Paris and tried himself as a model in a few fashion shows, and even was shot by Giampaolo Sgura for Hercules International magazine. Armstrong was featuring New Zealand menswear brand, Working Style for their Autumn Winter 2014 campaign.

And now Armstrong want to become a gigolo, as he said, this job with bring him money and pleasure.

So, help Armstrong to take his place on the street!

data.short_description: Armstrong is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
